alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 6:23PM MDT until March 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation 6 to 12 inches from roughly the Ogden area mountains to the Cottonwood Canyons. Accumulations will be less outside this area. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, particularly for Parleys and the Cottonwoods. This will include the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
